map

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • map.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGrid

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGrid
    representing the map witch is a 2 dimensional Array of type Field. implements IGrid witch include methods for manipulating and transform the map e.g setSpeedLimit() witch allow to set the speed limit for a certain part of a street
    Author:
    Josef Weldemariam, Matr. 7316168

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DirectedGraph dg 
      static UndirectedGraphMatrix udgm 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(int dim1, int dim2)
      main constructor: initialize grid as a 2-dimensional array of type Field with the value 2 witch represents the class tree then the field id, in case of a street field also the speed limit and the directions for every for every field are read in.
      Grid(int dim1, int dim2, double x)
      test constructor: initialize grid as a 2-dimensional array of type Field with the value 2 witch represents the class tree
      Grid(int dim1, int dim2, double x, double y)
      first constructor: initialize grid as a 2-dimensional array of type Field then implement the whole map with methods of this class.
      Grid(int dim1, int dim2, java.lang.String x)
      constructor for the big map. initialize the small grid four times.

      • Grid

        public Grid(int dim1,
            int dim2,
            java.lang.String x)
        constructor for the big map. initialize the small grid four times. In left button part without pipes and two on the right sight without buildings and pipes
        Parameters:
        dim1 - row dimension of the small grid
        dim2 - column dimension of the small grid
        x - placeholder

      • Grid

        public Grid(int dim1,
            int dim2)
        main constructor: initialize grid as a 2-dimensional array of type Field with the value 2 witch represents the class tree then the field id, in case of a street field also the speed limit and the directions for every for every field are read in. At the end we called addPipeCapacity
        Parameters:
        dim1 - row dimension of grid
        dim2 - column dimension of grid

      • Grid

        public Grid(int dim1,
            int dim2,
            double x,
            double y)
        first constructor: initialize grid as a 2-dimensional array of type Field then implement the whole map with methods of this class. Hard coding
        Parameters:
        dim1 - number of rows
        dim2 - number of columns

        public void writeFile()
